content: The following lists the **national swimming records for [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)**. They are the fastest times ever swum by a [Singaporean](/wiki/Singapore) in each long-course (50 m) event. These records are kept/maintained by the country's national federation for swimming/aquatic sports: the [Singapore Aquatics](/wiki/Singapore_Aquatics) (SAQ). ## Long course (50 m) ### Men title: List of Singaporean records in swimming
